title: Part 2: Wendy Liebman + News (ACS June 29)
itunes:title: Part 2: Wendy Liebman + News (ACS June 29)
description:
Comedian Wendy Liebman comes in the studio and talks about how she will be opening for Bill Maher and recounts her experience surviving two car accidents and shingles. She explains how her husband taking the polio vaccine when he was a child inspired his composer father to write ‘A Spoon Full of Sugar’ in ‘Mary Poppins’. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Ghislaine Maxwell getting sentenced to 20 years for aiding Epstein, the rundown on Roe V Wade being overturned, and the bench clearing brawl at the Angels-Mariners game. 

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
